name: Sunwalker
description:
SUNWALKER

Sunwalker is a game made for the Mockup Jam. Venture through the vastness of the desert on a special journey: you have to collect all magic seeds lost around the world of Sandwalker. Create your own wanderer, dress appropriately and protect yourself from the dangers of the desert. Investigate ancient ruins for scrap metal and other valuables, who knows what you could find on the desert wastes?

Rescue a scrap pet, modify and upgrade it to help you scan the sand on your journey. Meet other wanderers, help them on their personal missions to earn their trust and who knows, maybe something more than their friendship? But watch out for the night gangs and enemies of the sands so your journey doesn't end sooner!
